es.ceu.alf.simeon

Class StandardComparisonMeasure

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ceu.alf.simeon.StandardComparisonMeasure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComparisonMeasure

    public final class StandardComparisonMeasure
extends java.lang.Object
implements ComparisonMeasure
    Class that implements the ComparisonMeasure with basic methods.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StandardComparisonMeasure

        public StandardComparisonMeasure(java.lang.Object source,
                                 java.lang.Object target,
                                 ComparisonMethod method,
                                 java.net.URI uri,
                                 java.net.URI agent)
        Constructor for comparison measures. It creates a comparison measure for the source and target objects given with the method, URI and agent given.
        Parameters:
        source - is the source object of the comparison.
        target - is the target object of the comparison.
        method - is the comparison method used to compare the source and target objects.
        uri - is the URI that identifies the comparison measure in the ontology.
        agent - is the URI of the agent that assess the comparison measure.

      • StandardComparisonMeasure

        Constructor for comparison measures. It creates a comparison measure for the source and target objects given with the identity function as a comparison method.
        Parameters:
        source - is the source object of the comparison.
        target - is the target object of the comparison.

      • StandardComparisonMeasure

        public StandardComparisonMeasure(java.lang.Object source,
                                 java.lang.Object target,
                                 java.lang.Float value,
                                 java.net.URI uri,
                                 java.net.URI agent)
        Constructor for comparison measures. It creates a comparison measure for the source, the target objects, the value, the URI and the agent given and no comparison method.
        Parameters:
        source - is the source object of the comparison.
        target - is the target object of the comparison.
        value - is the value of the measure.
        uri - is the URI that identifies the comparison measure in the ontology.
        agent - is the URI of the agent that assess the comparison measure.

                                 java.net.URI uri)

        Parameters:
        source - is the source object of the comparison.
        target - is the target object of the comparison.
        value - is the value of the measure.
        uri - is the URI that identifies the comparison measure in the ontology.
